Regain Benefits from Agile Software Development - Jutta Eckstein - ACCU 2025
---

All too often, Agile (or Scrum or SAFe) feels more like being restricted by rules that are in our way to productivity. It has not been designed that way. Just the opposite, it has always meant to keep obstacles out of the way, in order to get more productive in development.

What causes the current problems and what can we do to get productivity back? Based on my own experience, in this session, I'll point out current problems, and misunderstandings, and how to overcome all of these to make Agile support and not hinder our work.

Slides: https://accu.org/conf-previous/accu2025/
